abstract: Richard D. Parsons, Citigroup’s chairman, said the board would restore Vikram S. Pandit’s compensation to a level comparable to that of other banking chiefs in 2011.
snippet: Richard D. Parsons, Citigroup’s chairman, said the board would restore Vikram S. Pandit’s compensation to a level comparable to that of other banking chiefs in 2011.
lead_paragraph: Vikram S. Pandit, Citigroup’s chief executive, turned down a potentially lucrative compensation package for the second consecutive year in a move that could help him avoid the uproar over pay in the postbailout era.

headline.main: Citigroup’s Pandit Takes $1 in Compensation for 2010
headline.print_headline: Pandit of Citigroup Takes $1 in Compensation for 2010
